item.title: 2 of the newly planted trees dead, 14th July
item.description:
I've reported this before. The council made the small area by Christ the king church hall on lakedale road nice with seating and planting. But 2 of the trees, silver birches, are stone dead. They will not resurrect, even being next to the church premises! They need replacing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lakedale Road, Plumstead, London

item.title: Dog waste to be cleared (recurring problem), 14th July
item.description:
Someone walks their dog here and thereâ€™s always dog waste around this area. Thereâ€™s also other hygiene concerns like fly tipping, people urinating, and human excretion that happens all the time. Can we have a board put up for the above please?

item.title: Deep pothole around manhole on Black Prince Road, 14th July
item.description:
There is a large pothole around a manhole cover on Black Prince Road outside Bramble Hub, approx. 28 Black Prince Road. I hit this pothole on my bike while my attention was drawn by another vehicle and was nearly thrown from my bike and have sustained a back injury. This pothole has been present for at least a month, possibly longer.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Black Prince Road, Lambeth, London
Report on FixMyStreet
